info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:58PM EDT until June 22 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Scottdale, or near Connellsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Connellsville, California, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, South Connellsville, Perryopolis, Seven Springs, Dunbar, Roscoe, Everson, Fayette City, and Newell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
